details.purpose: *To record a request for any or all healthcare services.(en)
details.use:
*To record a request for any or all healthcare services.
Commonly used requests may be specialised and based on this archetype. (en)

items.items: *Request for a healthcare service to be supplied by another healthcare provider or support agency.(en)
*For example: a request for post-operative observations; or a request for home help services to be supplied on discharge from hospital.(en)
العنصر التعريفي المحلي الذي تم تعيينه للأمر بواسطة مُزَوِّد الخدمة الصحية أو المؤسسة الصحية التي قامت بطلب الخدمة. و يتم الإشارة إليه أيضا بأنه العنصر التعريفي لمن قام بالأمر.
العنصر التعريفي الذي تم تعيينه للأمر بواسطة مُزَوِّد الخدمة الصحية أو المؤسسة الصحية التي تستقبل الأمر لإجراء الخدمة. و يتم الإشارة إليه أيضا بالعنصر التعريفي لمُنَفِّذ الأمر.
*The date and/or time when the service is due.(en)

*In practice, clinicians will often think in terms of ordering services in inexact terms, for example: review in 3 months, 6 months or 12 months. As clinical systems need more exact parameters to operate on, this '3 month' will be converted to an exact date 3 months from the date of recording and stored using this data element.(en)
*Phrase or code providing the reason or indication for the request.(en)
*Coding of the 'Reason for request' with a coding system is desirable, if available(en)
*Narrative description about the reason or indication for request.(en)
القصد الذي تم تبيينه عن الطلب الذي تم بواسطة من قام بإحالة المريض.
*For example: palliative care or active treatment.(en)
إذا كانت هذه المعلومة صحيحة فذلك يشير إلى أنه تم التعرف على معلومات إضافية و سيتم إحالتها حينما تكون متاحة, مثلا: نتائج غير مكتملة لاختبار خاص بالباثولوجيا/المَرَضية.
تفاصيل حول طبيعة المعلومات التكميلية التي ينبغي اتباعها, مثل اسم الاختبارات المعملية.
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
اللغة, وسيلة الانتقال, أو المتطلبات الشخصية الأخرى لدعم حضور و مشاركة المريض في أثناء تقديم الخدمة.
*Identification of the service requested, by name.(en)
*Coding of the 'Service name' with a coding system is desirable, if available(en)
حالة طلب الخدمة كما تتم الإشارة إليه بواسطة من طلب الأمر. تستخدم الحالة للإشارة إلى ما إذا كان هذا هو الطلب المبدئي أم أنه طلب متابعة لتغيير معلومات أو التزويد بمعلومات تكميلية.
قائمة من الأشخاص أو المؤسسات الذين ينبغي أن يستقبلوا نُسَخًا من أي نوع من الاتصال.
*Structured additional detail about the service requested.(en)
*For example: insert the CLUSTER archetype specifying the specific catheter that is to be inserted.(en)
تفاصيل حول مُزَوِّد الخدمة الصحية أو المؤسسة الصحية التي تطلب الخدمة.
تفاصيل حول مُزَوِّد الخدمة الصحية أو المؤسسة الصحية التي تستقبل طلب تقديم الخدمة.
آخر تاريخ لاتزال الخدمة مطلوبة في أثناءه
آخر تاريخ لا يزال فيه مقبولا أن يتم إكمال/إتمام الخدمة.
*For example: a service may be required to be completed before another event, such as scheduled surgery.(en)
Request for a healthcare service to be supplied by another healthcare provider or support agency.
For example: a request for post-operative observations; or a request for home help services to be supplied on discharge from hospital.
The local ID assigned to the order by the healthcare provider or organisation requesting the service. This is also referred to as Placer Order Identifier.
The ID assigned to the order by the healthcare provider or organisation receiving the request for service. This is also referred to as Filler Order Identifier.
The date and/or time when the service is due.

In practice, clinicians will often think in terms of ordering services in inexact terms, for example: review in 3 months, 6 months or 12 months. As clinical systems need more exact parameters to operate on, this '3 month' will be converted to an exact date 3 months from the date of recording and stored using this data element.
Phrase or code providing the reason or indication for the request.
Coding of the 'Reason for request' with a coding system is desirable, if available
Narrative description about the reason or indication for request.
Stated intent for the request by the referrer.
For example: palliative care or active treatment.
True indicates that additional information has been identified and will be forwarded when available eg incomplete pathology test results.
Details of the nature of supplementary information that is to follow e.g name of laboratory results.
Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.
For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.
Language, transport or other personal requirements to support the patient's attendance or participation in provision of the service.
Identification of the service requested, by name.
Coding of the 'Service name' with a coding system is desirable, if available

The status of the request for service as indicated by the requester. Status is used to denote whether this is the initial request, or a follow-up request to change or provide supplementary information.
A list of person's or organisation who should receive copies of any communication.
Structured additional detail about the service requested.
For example: insert the CLUSTER archetype specifying the specific catheter that is to be inserted.
Narrative description of the service requested.
Details about the healthcare provider or organisation requesting the service.
Details about the healthcare provider or organisation receiving the request for service.
The latest date that is acceptable for the service to be completed.
For example: a service may be required to be completed before another event, such as scheduled surgery.
*Request for a healthcare service to be supplied by another healthcare provider or support agency.(en)
*For example: a request for post-operative observations; or a request for home help services to be supplied on discharge from hospital.(en)
En lokal ID tillagt rekvisisjonen av rekvirent eller organisasjonen som rekvirerer tjenesten. Dette kalles også 'Rekvirent Bestiller Identifikator'.
En ID som tillegges rekvisisjonen av helsetjeneste yter eller organisasjon som mottaker rekvisisjon for en helsetjenesten. Dette kalles også Tjeneste Leverandør Identifikator.
*The date and/or time when the service is due.(en)

*In practice, clinicians will often think in terms of ordering services in inexact terms, for example: review in 3 months, 6 months or 12 months. As clinical systems need more exact parameters to operate on, this '3 month' will be converted to an exact date 3 months from the date of recording and stored using this data element.(en)
*Phrase or code providing the reason or indication for the request.(en)
*Coding of the 'Reason for request' with a coding system is desirable, if available(en)
*Narrative description about the reason or indication for request.(en)
*For example: palliative care or active treatment.(en)
Graden av hast med hensyn til rekvisisjonen.
Sann: indikerer at der er identifisert ytterligere informasjon som vil bli fremsendt når dette er tilgjengelig, fx inkomplette lab resultater.
Detaljer om de supplerende opplysninger som vil følge, fx navnet på lab test resultatet.
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
Språk, transport eller annen personlige behov for at støtte pasientens fremmøte eller deltakelse i utførelsen av helsetjenesten.
*Identification of the service requested, by name.(en)
*Coding of the 'Service name' with a coding system is desirable, if available(en)

Status for rekvisisjon av en tjeneste som angitt av rekvirent. Status anvendes til at vise om dette er den opprinnelige rekvisisjon eller en oppfølgende rekvisisjon for at endre eller gi supplerende informasjon.
En liste av personer eller organisasjon som bør motta kopier av noen kommunikasjon.
*Structured additional detail about the service requested.(en)
*For example: insert the CLUSTER archetype specifying the specific catheter that is to be inserted.(en)
Detaljer om helsetjeneste yter eller organisasjon som rekvirerer tjenesten.
Detaljer om helsetjeneste yter eller organisasjon som mottar rekvisisjonen for en helsetjeneste.
Den seneste dato for når det er akseptabelt for at tjenesten blir utført.
*For example: a service may be required to be completed before another event, such as scheduled surgery.(en)
Solicitud de servicio de atención de la salud
*Request for a healthcare service to be supplied by another healthcare provider or support agency.(en)
*For example: a request for post-operative observations; or a request for home help services to be supplied on discharge from hospital.(en)
El ID local asignado a la solicitud por parte del prestador u organización proveedora de servicios de salud que solicita el servicio. También conocido como Identificador del Colocador de la Orden.

El ID asignado a la solicitud por parte del prestador u organización proveedora de servicios de salud que recibe la solicitud del servicio. También conocido como Identificador del Receptor de la Orden.
*The date and/or time when the service is due.(en)

*In practice, clinicians will often think in terms of ordering services in inexact terms, for example: review in 3 months, 6 months or 12 months. As clinical systems need more exact parameters to operate on, this '3 month' will be converted to an exact date 3 months from the date of recording and stored using this data element.(en)
*Phrase or code providing the reason or indication for the request.(en)
*Coding of the 'Reason for request' with a coding system is desirable, if available(en)
*Narrative description about the reason or indication for request.(en)
Propósito declarado de la solicitud por parte del solicitante.
*For example: palliative care or active treatment.(en)
"Verdadero" indica que se ha identificado información adicional y que será remitida cuando se encuentre disponible. Ej.: resultados de una prueba de patología incompleta.
Detalle de la naturaleza de la información suplementaria que se prevé. Ej.: nombre del resultado de laboratorio.
*Additional information required to capture local content or to align with other reference models/formalisms.(en)
*For example: local information requirements or additional metadata to align with FHIR or CIMI equivalents.(en)
Requerimientos de idioma, transporte, u otros, que asistan al paciente para concurrir o participar en la provisión del servicio.
*Identification of the service requested, by name.(en)
*Coding of the 'Service name' with a coding system is desirable, if available(en)

El estado de la solicitud de servicio según el solicitante. El "estado" se utiliza para denotar si se trata de un solicitud inicial, a una solicitud de cambio o provisión de información de la solicitud en curso.
Lista de distribución para la respuesta
Lista de personas o la organización que debería recibir copias de cualquier comunicación.
*Structured additional detail about the service requested.(en)
*For example: insert the CLUSTER archetype specifying the specific catheter that is to be inserted.(en)
Detalles del prestador u organización proveedora de servicios de atención de la salud que solicita el servicio.
Detalles del prestador u organización proveedora de servicios de atención de la salud que recibe la solicitud del servicio.
La fecha mas tardía aceptable para el cumplimiento del servicio.
*For example: a service may be required to be completed before another event, such as scheduled surgery.(en)
